name: Voices Near the Stroke of Midnight
name_original: Voices Near the Stroke of Midnight
description:
A short parser game to celebrate the end of 2018. Main story by Bruno Dias, with contributions from Sam Kabo Ashwell, Astrid Dalmady, Brendan Patrick Hennessy, Cat Manning, Laura Michet, and Katherine Morayati.

Play by running Play.html in a browser, or use an interpreter of your choice.
